data.name: RTE worlds
data.detailed_description:
Explore a randomly generated world set 50 years after the devastation caused by the invasion of an unknown alien species.
Reclaim the world by building roads and reshaping the landscape. Team up with other players to build, craft , survive and explore an infinite world by land, sea and air.

The story:

RTE worlds is set 50 years after THE INVASION, aliens, mutants and surviving human factions, overrun the world. You wake up in a resistance camp to learn that you were rescued from an alien transport ship.
Camp hope is a forward base of operations for the resistance and the mission is to take back the planet.

Random gen world:

RTE worlds will have a randomly generated world, where you can explore land, sea and Air. I have also added a heavy RPG element into the game and a wide range of weapons to use. The world map is infinite; you can explore it using crafted land vehicles, airships and submersibles. Explore underwater POIs, hovering motherships, and land POIs.

Random dungeons:

The map is littered with random dungeons to explore, every time you enter a dungeon it will have a different configuration. Dungeons will have loot rooms , locked doors and rare loot not found anywhere else.

Player built road system:

50 years into the future all traces of human civilization has been reclaimed by nature, but players have the ability to build their own road network as well as flatten the landscape to build houses and farms.

Base building:

RTE worlds has a new building system, very intuitive and versatile; you start by building a cheap skeleton structure then start upgrading it depending on your level and tools. Besides the main structure upgrade path, you can unlock additional building blocks in different stations.

Role-playing(RPG):

The RPG element will be based on skill points that you can assign to abilities, skills or unlock crafting recipes. Using weapons will grant you weapon proficiency point that will enable you to deal more damage and use a same higher tier weapon type. You will be able to loot book pages and later combine them into books to give you more experience points.



Quests and missions:

You can get quests and missions from NPCs all around the map, from getting supplies to activating and freeing villages that will become your allies.

Weather and temperature:

the world will have a real time weather system, temperatures will vary depending on the biome you are in, build fire, burners and wear insulated clothes to protect you from the elements.

The wellness system:

Your wellness is key to your survival, if your wellness drops, all regenerations will stop, max stamina will be slashed in half, and max carry weight will be slashed in half. To increase your wellness, you can sleep in good beds, drink alcohol, and be around furniture or campfires. Being around other players will slow wellness decay, so teaming up with other players has never been so beneficial.


The unexplored zones:

Some zones in RTE worlds will need special masks, many went to explore them and none returned, enter at your own risk!

Traversing the world:

Traversing the worlds has never been so easy, you can now climb almost anything, you can dodge roll in all four directions and you can craft a glider to jump from high cliffs.

World events:

RTE worlds is a living world where anything can happen at any moment, alien drop ships, meteors , huge hordes, tornados , deadly fogs, just to name a few.

Join our development discord to follow up on the development

data.short_description: Explore a randomly generated world set 50 years after the devastation caused by the invasion of an unknown alien species. Reclaim the world by building roads and reshaping the landscape. Team up with other players to build, craft , survive and explore an infinite world by land, sea and air.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sounds card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: I9
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2080 ti or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sounds card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
